name: Tenrikyo Service Times Widget
author: Lewis Nakao

sections.description:
This widget was built to display the current daily service times for the morning and evening services at the
Tenrikyo Church Headquarters Main Sanctuary. At nearly every half a month, the service times change in sync with
the times of sun rise and sun set.

Features

  • Automatically displays current service time.
  • Available in English and Japanese.
  • The title is customizable.

Future Features

  • Make translation files separate from the class file.
  • Make it easier to add events.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the tenrikyo-service-times-widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You will see the widget available under ‘Appearance’ -> ‘Widgets’. Click and drag the widget into your desired
    position on the side-bar.
sections.changelog:
0.1.2

October 22, 2011

  • The month is highlighted on the Time Chart.
  • Uploaded to Plugin Directory

short_description: This is a widget that displays the current service times and time chart for the Tenrikyo Church Headquarters service times.

upgrade_notice.0.1.2: This widget hasn't been heavily tested on older versions of WordPress, but it seems like it would work just fine.

screenshots.caption: The options available in the widget. This can be found once you've dragged the widget into a side bar.
This is with the current time chart expanded.
